Ambit's Guaranteed Savings Plan (GSP) provides a 1% annual savings compared to what the incumbent utility would have charged if you were a full-service customer for the same period. After 12 consecutive months on the GSP, you'll either save with Ambit or we'll mail a check for the difference.
